A limitation intervention include failure address key factor associate dietary pattern child , parental stress level . Therefore , identification intervention model target factor effective , acceptable , feasible among parent young minority child important . Subjects ask take part study parent child receives care Texas Children 's Pediatrics ( TCP ) clinic study do child 's body mass index 85th percentile . DOC.brief_title: Smart Secure Children Program Preschool Obesity
DOC.detailed_description: Thirty ( 30 ) subject enrol across three ( 3 ) TCP clinic study take place . Two type participant recruit study : parent participant receive intervention interventionist participant deliver intervention . Data collect study include 4 type : parent-report questionnaire , parent saliva sample , parent-report child 's 24-hour food recall , audio-recordings intervention session . Parent-report questionnaires assess family demographic information , parental stress , depression , well-being well parental feeding practice child dietary food pattern . Procedures Parent Participants : Parents randomize intervention ( Group A-15 parent ) control condition ( Group B-15 parent ) . Parents randomized intervention group participate 10-session SSC program co-led trained parent interventionist . Sessions audio-recorded allow intervention fidelity check . Parents randomize control condition receive SSC write handout , enhance standard care parent see primary care . If subject assign Group A , participate ten intervention session conduct TCP clinic . During session , subject provide information specific skill improve child 's emotional health dietary pattern stress level . If subject assign Group B , receive write handouts child 's dietary pattern parent stress level . They instruct write goal document goal progress . This care plan standard practice presently implement site 's TCP clinic . After ten week , regardless group subject assign , complete interview child 's dietary food pattern questionnaires emotions/opinions parent child feeding practice . The subject also ask collect saliva four time point single day home . Procedures Interventionist Participants : Six interventionist participant recruit . Those indicate interest meet PI research staff member obtain consent . They receive 40-hours training intervention provide study staff . Intervention participant deliver one group intervention , 10 session .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Parent Participants : NonLatino African American Latino parents/primary caregiver ( define primary guardian , may include legal guardian foster parent ) child patient ( age 25 year ) Texas Children 's Pediatrics ( TCP ) Community Care medical practice ( Gulfgate , Cullen , Corinthian Pointe ) Parents child body mass index ( BMI ) great 85th less 95th percentile ( overweight ) great 95th percentile ( obese ) English primary household language Inclusion Criteria Interventionist Participants : NonLatino African American Latino , 18 year old , GED/high school diploma , parent young child Exclusion Criteria Parent Participants : Parents child type food allergy , parent child receive current intervention weight Parents child weightrelated medical condition ( e.g. , PraderWilli Syndrome ) Parents child take medication ( e.g. , stimulant ) associate appetite Exclusion Criteria Parent Participants :
